stories.Title: Samsung limits the use of generative AI by workers
stories.Description: Following an accidental internal data leak, the company is planning to temporarily ban the use of generative AI on company-owned devices and devices running on internal networks.
stories.Tweet: Samsung limits the use of generative AI by workers 📦 Following an accidental internal data leak, the company is planning to temporarily ban the use of generative AI on company-owned devices and devices running on internal networks. #samsung https://techcrunch.com/2023/05/02/samsung-bans-use-of-generative-ai-tools-like-chatgpt-after-april-internal-data-leak/

stories.Title: ChatGPT's empathy is what healthcare needs
stories.Description: OpenAI's chatbot is a promising tool for answering medical questions since it provides more valuable and compassionate guidance.
stories.Tweet: ChatGPT's empathy is what healthcare needs 📦 OpenAI's chatbot is a promising tool for answering medical questions since it provides more valuable and compassionate guidance. #chatGPT https://www.businessinsider.com/chatgpt-more-empathetic-than-doctors-study-save-time-bedside-manner-2023-5

stories.Title: Hollywood writers are concerned about AI
stories.Description: A strike has been called by the Writers Guild of America over issues such as better payment, working conditions, and AI protections.
stories.Tweet: Hollywood writers are concerned about AI 📦 A strike has been called by the Writers Guild of America over issues such as better payment, working conditions, and AI protections. #ai https://gizmodo.com/wga-hollywood-writers-strike-ai-streaming-giants-netfli-1850392107

stories.Title: AI can now turn thoughts into text
stories.Description: Researchers at the University of Texas developed an AI decoder that translates brain activity into text, this achievement brings new hope for patients with neurological diseases.
stories.Tweet: AI can now turn thoughts into text 📦 Researchers at the University of Texas developed an AI decoder that translates brain activity into text, this achievement brings new hope for patients with neurological diseases. #ai https://www.theguardian.com/technology/2023/may/01/ai-makes-non-invasive-mind-reading-possible-by-turning-thoughts-into-text

stories.Title: IBM wants to replace job positions with AI
stories.Description: Due to the possibility of AI replacing 30% of non-customer-facing roles and back-office functions in the next 5 years, the company's CEO Arvind Krishna announced a pause in hiring.
stories.Tweet: IBM wants to replace job positions with AI 📦 Due to the possibility of AI replacing 30% of non-customer-facing roles and back-office functions in the next 5 years, the company's CEO Arvind Krishna announced a pause in hiring. #ibm https://finance.yahoo.com/news/ibm-pause-hiring-plans-replace-212747073.html

stories.Title: Environmental groups are unhappy with SpaceX
stories.Description: A lawsuit has been filed against the Federal Aviation Administration, alleging inadequate regulation of the Starship rocket launch and negative impacts on surrounding habitats and communities.
stories.Tweet: Environmental groups are unhappy with SpaceX 📦 A lawsuit has been filed against the Federal Aviation Administration, alleging inadequate regulation of the Starship rocket launch and negative impacts on surrounding habitats and communities. #spaceX https://arstechnica.com/science/2023/05/environmental-groups-sue-the-faa-over-spacex-launch-from-texas/

stories.Title: Get a Tesla while the deal lasts
stories.Description: The automaker has increased Model 3 and Model Y prices in key markets after earlier cuts, but prices still remain lower than at the start of the year.
stories.Tweet: Get a Tesla while the deal lasts 📦 The automaker has increased Model 3 and Model Y prices in key markets after earlier cuts, but prices still remain lower than at the start of the year. #tesla https://www.cnbc.com/2023/05/02/tesla-raises-car-prices-in-us-china-and-other-markets-after-cuts.html

stories.Title: Apple and Google care about your privacy
stories.Description: Both companies are teaming up to prevent lost item trackers, like the AirTag, from being used to track people without their consent.
stories.Tweet: Apple and Google care about your privacy 📦 Both companies are teaming up to prevent lost item trackers, like the AirTag, from being used to track people without their consent. #apple https://www.cnbc.com/2023/05/02/apple-and-google-team-up-to-stop-unwanted-airtag-tracking.html

stories.Title: Microsoft plans for a more private ChatGPT
stories.Description: Looking to appeal to businesses such as banks, financial services, and healthcare institutions, the company wants to offer a version of the chatbot that brings more privacy to confidential data.
stories.Tweet: Microsoft plans for a more private ChatGPT 📦 Looking to appeal to businesses such as banks, financial services, and healthcare institutions, the company wants to offer a version of the chatbot that brings more privacy to confidential data. #microsoft https://www.macrumors.com/2023/05/02/microsoft-planning-private-version-of-chatgpt/

stories.Title: Analyze your data with Quadratic
stories.Description: This infinite canvas spreadsheet with built-in Python, SQL, and Formulas, allows you to work with data from multiple sources and collaborate with ease.
stories.Tweet: Analyze your data with Quadratic 📦 This infinite canvas spreadsheet with built-in Python, SQL, and Formulas, allows you to work with data from multiple sources and collaborate with ease. #programming https://www.producthunt.com/posts/quadratic

stories.Title: Don’t be alarmed by layoffs
stories.Description: Employers are still hiring in the tech industry despite significant layoffs this year, which means there are plenty of career opportunities available for those interested in the field.
stories.Tweet: Don’t be alarmed by layoffs 📦 Employers are still hiring in the tech industry despite significant layoffs this year, which means there are plenty of career opportunities available for those interested in the field. #tech https://thenextweb.com/news/tech-job-opportunities-strong-despite-layoffs

title: Samsung bans ChatGPT, Apple and Google team up, AI translates thoughts into text
